title: ISic030037. ISic030037
body:
Facsimile Images

a

Σο̄́κα Χα
Σο̄́[κα] Νιλ
b

[---]ΛΕΜΑ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Cordano.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Σο̄́κα could be the female form of Σῶκος; on the two lines this name is followed by different words, probably names of accessaries or of father and mother which were either abbreviated or continued at the right of a crack in the tablet (O. reports no further letters). (SEG)

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 133 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Cordano 1988 18 no. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002411
  • Orsi 1904 922 no. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002433
  • Jeffery 1955 74 no. 15 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002443
  • 38.0937 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Pace 1927 161 no. 10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001692
